content.question: Directions: You will hear a series of brief conversations between two speakers. Each exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Non merci, il me le faut tout de suite.
Merci, j’irai le chercher au rayon d’anthropologie.
Non, je n’ai pas commandé votre catalogue.
D'accord, je le prends. C'est combien?

content.answer: Non merci, il me le faut tout de suite.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives
